College_Name: JIPMER Puducherry
College_Summary: Jawaharlal Institute of Postgraduate Medical Education and Research (JIPMER) is one of the premier medical institutes in India. JIPMER was established on its current campus in 1964 in Puducherry and is recognized by the Medical Council of India. JIPMER has been ranked as the 5th Best Medical Institute in India as per NIRF Ranking 2023. It has also been recognized as an ‘Institution of National Importance’ by the Government of India. JIPMER Puducherry is among the very few institutions in the country that offer courses from undergraduate to super specialty levels in the field of Medicine and Health Sciences.

College_Name: Pondicherry University
College_Summary: Pondicherry University is a central university, located in Pondicherry. Established in 1985, Pondicherry university is recognized by the UGC and accredited by the NAAC with an ‘A’ grade. The university has secured #801-1000 rank in World University category by QS World Ranking 2023.

College_Name: Mahatma Gandhi Medical College and Research Institute, Sri Balaji Vidyapeeth - [MGMCRI]
College_Summary: One of the leading medical institutions based in Puducherry, Mahatma Gandhi Medical College and Research Institute offers excellent environment for academics and overall development of students. The quality of teaching is very high and the infrastructural facilities are excellent. A lot of contribution is being made by the Institute in the field of professional health education. High standards of education are relentlessly maintained and the Institute also boasts about excellent academic achievements of their students. The Institute is also a fine example of architectural marvel. It provides high end medical services to the people residing in nearby areas.

College_Name: Pondicherry Institute of Medical Sciences
College_Summary: Pondicherry Institute of Medical Sciences is a Christian Minority Institution that was founded in 2002 by the Madras Medical Mission. It is made up of two colleges namely Medical College & Nursing College. The college is approved for full recognition by MCI for the MBBS Degree granted by Pondicherry University as it is fully affiliated with Pondicherry University.

College_Name: SMVMCH Pondicherry
College_Summary: Sri Manakula Vinayagar Medical College and Hospital, Pondicherry, was established in 2006 as a private medical institute. The college is affiliated to Pondicherry University and all the courses at SMVMCH Pondicherry are approved by the Medical Council of India. SMVMCH Pondicherry is spread over 220 acres of land and has over 12500 students and 2500 employees. For transport facilities, the college has 150 buses.

College_Name: Pondicherry Engineering College (PEC)
College_Summary: Pondicherry Engineering College (PEC) is an engineering college located in Pillaichavady at the East Coast Road. PEC was established under the VII 5 Year Plan and has been ranked at 76th in the Engineering Category according to the NIRF Rankings 2019. It is an autonomous college in terms of administration and staff recruitment. The college offers 8 undergraduate and 13 postgraduate programs. With a total of 12 departments, the college provides B.Tech and M.Tech courses in Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering and several more specializations.

NIT Puducherry
College_Summary: NIT Puducherry is an autonomous university, ranked 101 for BTech by NIRF 2023. NIT Puducherry provides various degrees in the field of engineering. NIT Puducherry offers undergraduate, postgraduate and doctorate courses. The NIT Puducherry is one of the thirty-one National Institutes of Technology established in the year 2009 by the Government of India. NIT Puducherry offers Dual Degree and Integrated courses which are 5-year programs with ten semesters

College_Name: Manakula Vinayagar Institute of Technology
College_Summary: Manakula Vinayagar Institute of Technology was established in 2008 and is affiliated to Pondicherry University. It is approved by AICTE and India Today ranks the Institute at #170 for the year 2020.

College_Name: Manakula Vinayagar Engineering College
College_Summary: Sri Manakula Vinayagar Engineering College (SMVEC), situated in the Puducherry Union Territory, is an engineering and management college offering 14 B.Tech programs, 8 postgraduate programs including MBA and MCA and 11 Research programs (PhD). All the B.Tech UG and PG programs including M.Tech, MCA & MBA are approved by AICTE New Delhi & UGC, and affiliated to Pondicherry University.

College_Name: Rajiv Gandhi College of Engineering and Technology, Pondicherry
College_Summary: Rajiv Gandhi College of Engineering and Technology is sponsored by Sri Balaji Educational and Charitable Public Trust. It is located in a beautiful, scenic location in an area of 30 acres at Kirumambakkam. The campus is well connected by road and rail service. The college has got its approval from AICTE for its various courses. Pondicherry University has provided affiliation to the college.

Achariya Arts and  Science College - [AASC], Pondicherry
College_Summary: Achariya Arts & Science College (AASC) is a private institute established in 2004. It is affiliated to Pondicherry University, a Central University in Puducherry, India. The college offers courses in Arts, Science, and Commerce. It is also recognized by the University Grants Commission(UGC) and has an Academic Zone, Canteen, library, Medical facilities, Placement, and residence for students.

College_Name: Avvaiyar Government College for Women - [AGCW], Karaikal
College_Summary: Avvaiyar Government College for Women (AGCW), Kodaikanal was established in 1972. It was started with Arts and Science Courses at Pre-University level. AGCW entered a new era completing 25 years of glorious service in the year 1996 by imparting its service in the field of women's education. The college is affiliated to Pondicherry Central University and recognized by University Grants Commission (UGC). It offers undergraduate and postgraduate Degree programs in Arts, Science and Commerce in various streams.

College_Name: Aarupadai Veedu Medical College
College_Summary: Aarupadai Veedu Medical College (AVMC) was founded in 2000, it is located at Kirumampakkam in Puducherry. The college is affiliated to the Vinayaka Missions University, Salem, Tamil Nadu. The institute offers various courses which include UG courses like MBBS, B.Sc (Nursing), BASLP (Bachelor of Audiology and Speech-Language Pathology), BPT, PG courses like MD/MS and Post Graduate Diploma in many specializations. Admission to the MBBS course is based on the applicant’s rank in NEET and admission to the MD/MS course is based on the applicant’s rank in NEET PG. The institute has approval from the Medical Council of India.

Pondicherry University Distance Education
College_Summary: Pondicherry University Distance Education covers UG, PG and PG diploma Programs in Arts, Commerce and Management. Admission to these courses is strictly based on merit except for Pondicherry University DDE MBA course, where CAT is accepted by the university for granting admission. The application process is in both Online & Offline mode. The Admission process usually commences in June for the Academic year or in January. The programs offered via Pondicherry University Distance Education are recognized by the AICTE, UGC & AIU, New Delhi. The university provides quality study materials for all the subjects along with standard textbooks of premier publishers for select subjects. Check: Pondicherry University Distance Education Admission

MGPGI Pondicherry
College_Summary: Mahatma Gandhi Postgraduate Institute of Dental Sciences (MGPGI) is a prestigious Government dental education institution established in the year 1990 in Puducherry. The institute is affiliated with Pondicherry University and is recognized by the Dental Council of India, Ministry of Health Family Welfare, Government of India. MGPGI, Pondicherry is one of the best dental institutions in the country in the government sector. The Institute offers a 5-year BDS (Bachelor of Dental Surgery) course and a 3-year MDS (Master of Dental Surgery) programme in seven specialities. Admission to both the programmes is based on merit as well as entrance exam which varies for the domicile and All-India Quota students.

VMMCH Karaikal
College_Summary: Vinayaka Missions Medical College and Hospital (VMMCH) was established in the year 1996 at Karaikal, Puducherry. It is a constituent college of the Vinayaka Missions University. The institute is approved and recognized by MCI and UGC.VMMCH Karaikal offers the MBBS program at the UG level and MS, MD programs across various disciplines at the PG level under highly-qualified faculties. The college campus spread over an area of 70 acres and provides all the facilities for the convenience of its students.

College_Name: Kasturba Gandhi Nursing College - [KGNC], Pondicherry
College_Summary: Kasturba Gandhi Nursing College, Pondicherry is a private nursing college established in the year 2003. It is a constituent college of Sri Balaji Vidyapeeth Deemed University and is approved by the Indian Nursing Council. The college offers B.Sc. Nursing, Post Basic B.Sc. Nursing at the UG level, M.Sc. Nursing at the PG level and PhD in Nursing at the research level. The college has a top-class infrastructure and experienced faculties to create a student-centric learning atmosphere.

Dr. B. R. Ambedkar Polytechnic College - [DBRAPC], Yanam
College_Summary: Dr. B. R. Ambedkar Polytechnic College at Yanam was established by Government of Puducherry on 1996 along with 4 other polytechnic colleges in Puducherry. All these colleges got established with the sponsorship of the Puducherry State Government under administrative jurisdiction of Pondicherry Institute of Post Matric Technical Education (PIPMATE) governed by a General Body under the Directorate of Higher and Technical Education. The College offer diploma level course to the students in 3 specializations. The admission is done on merit basis in online mode.

There are 6 departments of the college in which students can get admission.
